original_solution_mapping.L1: He spent $50.00 and 80% of the meal went to entrees so he spent 50*.80 = $40.00 on entrees
original_solution_mapping.L2: He spent $50.00 and $40.00 went to entrees so that leaves $50 - $40 = $<<50-40=10.00>>10.00 for appetizers
original_solution_mapping.L3: Each appetizer costs the same amount and he spent $10.00 all together so each appetizer is $10/2 = $<<10/2=5.00>>5.00

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4418.
    Returns: the price of a single appetizer.
    """
    # L1
    total_meal_cost = 50.00 # $50.00 on Chinese take-out
    entree_percentage_as_decimal = 0.80 # 80% of the cost went to 4 entrees
    cost_on_entrees = total_meal_cost * entree_percentage_as_decimal

    # L2
    cost_on_appetizers = total_meal_cost - cost_on_entrees

    # L3
    num_appetizers = 2 # 2 appetizers
    price_per_appetizer = cost_on_appetizers / num_appetizers

    # FA
    answer = price_per_appetizer
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He spent ${total_meal_cost} and 80% of the meal went to entrees so he spent {total_meal_cost}*{entree_percentage_as_decimal} = ${cost_on_entrees} on entrees

He spent ${total_meal_cost} and ${cost_on_entrees} went to entrees so that leaves ${total_meal_cost} - ${cost_on_entrees} = $<<{total_meal_cost}-{cost_on_entrees}={cost_on_appetizers}>>{cost_on_appetizers} for appetizers

Each appetizer costs the same amount and he spent ${cost_on_appetizers} all together so each appetizer is ${cost_on_appetizers}/{num_appetizers} = $<<{cost_on_appetizers}/{num_appetizers}={price_per_appetizer}>>{price_per_appetizer}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: He spent $50 and 80% of the meal went to entrees so he spent 50*0.8 = $40 on entrees
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He spent $50 and $40 went to entrees so that leaves $50 - $40 = $<<50-40=10>>10 for appetizers
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Each appetizer costs the same amount and he spent $10 all together so each appetizer is $10/2 = $<<10/2=8>>8

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '-' instead.
